about.title: About
about.dev: Front-end developer specialized in javascript frameworks such as AngularJS, React and Vue. I'm have an interest for integration, ergonomics and accessibility, as well as communication. My goal is to build bridges between designers and developpers, by understanding challenges and constraints on both sides. Developping UX is an exciting field for its evolving technologies and paradigms. But it foremost forces empathy toward users, and allows to work with various profiles going from back-end developers to artists. This richness and human aspect is what I enjoy the most.
about.games: I also develop games on my spare time. They are mostly experimental, narrative and contemplative, with sometimes a focus on generative music. It's a great way to experiment with technologies, notably the Web Audio API. They also encourage me to create non utilitarian projects, using technologies only for entertainment, art, and in the end making them more human. Games are the ideal media to combine my developpers skills with some of my hobbies, such as writing and composing.
about.perso: Outside of these activities, I enjoy theatre (as an amateur comedian), video editing, piano, walks and board games.

mgdis.description: Web Front-End development for decision assisting tools used by public organisms
